alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:00PM EDT until August 07 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN PULASKI...NORTHWESTERN FULTON... SOUTHEASTERN STARKE AND SOUTHWESTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 259 PM EDT/159 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Culver, or 8 miles southeast of Knox, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Knox, North Judson, Culver, Oak Grove, Monterey, Leiters Ford, Beardstown, Ober, Twin Lakes, Rutland, Burr Oak, Maxinkuckee, Denham, Toto, Hibbard, Winona, Delong, Bass Lake and Ora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
